        public static java.lang.String getUsedMiddleware()
        Get middleware selection
        Returns:
        latest middleware selection. LOCAL is default value. Current values are "JADE","RMI" or "LOCAL".

      • setUsedMiddleware

        public static void setUsedMiddleware(java.lang.String middlewarename)
        set middleware to use for running the agents.
        Parameters:
        middlewarename - is middleware to run during startup. allowed values: NONE, JADE, RMI.
